job_history.work_description: Review, verify and input personnel action forms for all certified, classified, and substitute positions. Process times sheets with the use of the Kronos timekeeping system for all employees of the schools assigned. Responsible for an annual payroll of over 18 million dollars.

Responsible for all payroll functions. Updated payroll records; including changes in employee tax exemptions, direct deposit, benefit deductions, and applicable garnishments. Provided timesheet training and granted access credentials for all new hires.

Developed and processed confidential payroll documentation for approximately 300 employees located throughout the Southeast Region. Executed payroll budget of over $45 million through the payroll processing vendor and ensured final disbursement of funds to employees.
Processed bi-weekly and semi-monthly payroll for 180 employees throughout the United States. Analyzed and reviewed benefit election documentation to ensure proper selections were made by employees.
Responsible for the payroll execution of nearly 400 employees in the Retail Division. Verified application packets to ensure all required documentation was captured.

Review confidential contractual offer letters for tenured and part-time professors to determine appropriate compensation packages. Contracts were negotiated with professors and upon approval, the financial conditions of the contract were executed.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Over 25 years of experience in payroll management, including processing payroll for large numbers of employees, managing payroll budgets, and ensuring compliance with regulations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Accounting
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with payroll accounting, including reviewing confidential contractual offer letters, determining compensation packages, and executing financial conditions of contracts, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Timekeeping Systems
skills.explanation: Experience with Kronos timekeeping system, suggesting strong proficiency in using timekeeping systems.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed payroll budgets of over $45 million, indicating strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Experience as a Staff Accountant, including processing bi-weekly and semi-monthly payroll, analyzing benefit election documentation, and reviewing confidential contractual offer letters, suggesting strong proficiency in accounting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Limited experience with leadership, but has provided timesheet training and granted access credentials for new hires, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: No mention of using Microsoft Excel in the job history, indicating no backing for this skill.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: No mention of financial reconciliation in the job history, indicating no backing for this skill.
